title: STEM schools project to prove game-changer: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 06 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhary Fawad Hussain on Wednesday said that Pakistan Science Foundation was going to launch an educational program on Tuesday(today) which in his view will be a game-changer.
